vote.title:
A public hearing to receive comments regarding an application for and an ordinance granting a Planned Development District for a GO General Office District and mixed uses on property zoned an R-5(A) Single Family District, an IR Industrial Research District, and a CS Commercial Service District, on the north side of Singleton Boulevard, between Bataan Street and Herbert Street
Recommendation of Staff:  Denial 
Recommendation of CPC:  Approval, subject to a development plan, a height plan, a streetscape exhibit, and conditions
Z190-180(PD)
